import React, { useState } from "react"; import { InovoiceDetails } from "./InovoiceDetails"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const calcTotal = (event) => { const targetDiv = event.target.closest(".invoice-details"); const qty = Array.from(targetDiv.children).filter( (el) => el.className === "quantity" || el.className === "unit-cost" ); const [qn, cst] = qty; const qnt = +qn.children[1].value; const cost = +cst.children[1].value; console.log(qnt, cost, qnt * cost); return cost * qnt; }; return (

INVOICE

Living Skies Window Tint 160C 16th Street West, Prince Albert, SK, S6V 3V3

Invoice #

BILL TO

SHIP TO

QTY

DESCRIPTION

UNIT COST

TOTAL

{total} {/* */}
); };
